import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# RPC Providers

To interact with the different networks of the Massa blockchain, you can select from any of the listed providers.
Be aware that the latency you encounter may vary depending on the provider's geographical location.
To enhance redundancy and facilitate load balancing, consider using multiple providers.

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="buildnet" label="👷 BuildNet" default>
    <table>
      <thead>
        <tr>
          <th>Provider</th>
          <th>Endpoint Root</th>
        </tr>
      </thead>
        <tbody>
        <tr>
          <td><a href="../networks-faucets">Massa Labs</a></td>
          <td><code>https://buildnet.massa.net/api/v2</code></td>
        </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="testnet" label="🧑‍🔬 TestNet">
    <table>
      <thead>
        <tr>
          <th>Provider</th>
          <th>Endpoint Root</th>
        </tr>
      </thead>
        <tbody>
        <tr>
          <td><a href="../networks-faucets">Massa Labs</a></td>
          <td><code>https://test.massa.net/api/v2</code></td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td><a href="https://www.altailabs.tech/">Altai Labs</a></td>
          <td><code>https://massexplo.io/api/node</code></td>
        </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
  </TabItem>
</Tabs>

JsonRPC port is `33035` and gRPC port is `33037`.

Find more details about API providers in [testnet status page](https://uptimekuma.maoudia.com/status/massa-testnet).
:::

| Provider   | Endpoint  | Features       | Status                      |
| ---------- | --------- | -------------- | ----------------------------|
| [Massa](/docs/build/networks-faucets) | `https://test.massa.net/api/v2` | JsonRPC | ![Massa offical testnet node status badge](https://uptimekuma.maoudia.com/api/badge/17/status?style=for-the-badge "Massa offical testnet node status badge") |
| aoudiamoncef | `81.49.155.238` | JsonRPC, gRPC | ![Moncef AOUDIA node status badge](https://uptimekuma.maoudia.com/api/badge/2/status?style=for-the-badge "Moncef AOUDIA testnet node status badge") |
